Retrieves a reference to the pointer-like object stored in a {{tt|propagate_const}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|pt|a {{tt|propagate_const}} object}}
{{par end}} 

===Return value===
A reference to the pointer-like object stored in {{c|pt}}.
